meanings.definition: To exceed in power or strength.
meanings.sent1: The superhero outpowers the villain in every battle.
meanings.sent2: The lion outpowers the hyena in the animal kingdom.
meanings.sent3: The tiny ant outpowers the big elephant in a strength contest.
meanings.sent4: The sun outpowers all the stars in the sky with its blazing energy.
meanings.sent5: The waterfall outpowers the stream with its mighty force.

meanings.definition: To be more powerful than someone or something else.
meanings.sent1: The champion boxer outpowers his opponent with his strong punches.
meanings.sent2: The storm outpowers the wind with its fierce gusts.
meanings.sent3: The little engine outpowers the big locomotive in a surprising turn of events.
meanings.sent4: The volcano outpowers all other natural disasters with its explosive eruptions.
meanings.sent5: The tsunami outpowers the waves with its massive destructive force.
